description: Details required for Condition 3 (Materials), Condition 4 (Detailed Drawings), Condition 7 (Noise Insulation), Condition 14 (Drainage Design) and Condition 17 (Landscape Treatment) of planning permission 21/01951/FUL (Demolition of existing offices and erection of 5 storey registered care home for the elderly (Use Class C2) including the provision of parking, landscaping, revisions to access and all other associated works including parking provision, cycle parking and refuse/recycling facilities)
